attributes.action: cancel the introduction of ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the Government's failure to maintain securely the personal data of every child benefit claimant in the country, this petition calls on the Prime Minister to scrap the introduction of ID cards which will contain far more information.

The public cannot be confident that their most intimate and personal data will be held securely by their government and therefore the introduction of ID cards should not continue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
